reviewText: The animation is great, the content is great and accurate. My only complaint is the giant yellow Izzit logo in the lower rigjt corner of the ENTIRE short. Good grief. Way to destroy every single scene. Giant thumbs down for that.
Awesome. Great learning experience as preschooler prepares to learn the history of our country.
Another wonderful film from Bert and Jennifer. Kids of all ages will love this story of early American history. Can't wait for the next one.
An excellent history learning program! Beautifully produced and full of wit and charm. Highly recommended!
This was a well-produced program, just like the first one. My students and my own children were engaged and excited about asking more questions afterwards.

My students are in love with Pups of Liberty: The Dog-claration of Independence.  I have used this series with both second graders and fifth graders studying U.S. History, and it is one of their very favorites.  I am amazed by how much historical detail they recall - they really LEARN so much from Pups of Liberty.  Anne Kennel and the adorable cast of dogs and cats bring the events surrounding the signing of the Declaration of Independence alive to students.  The animation is of the highest quality, and the story perfectly captures the heart and spirit of the American Revolution.  This DVD is a gem!

Full of grace, charm, and whit "Pups of Liberty: The Dog-claration of Independance" is a fun and memorable way to learn and experience American history. As a parent in particular, I enjoy watching my kids watch these. They are drawn in by the charm, they absorb the information because of the grace of story-telling, and watching them discover the hidden whit is a joy. I highly recommend it for all ages!
This is a great film that teaches the story of the Declaration of Independence. My kids really loved it and wanted to learn more about Benjamin Franklin.
